view.animations.unit

Class AbstractEnemyView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.animations.unit.AbstractAnimationView
      • view.animations.unit.AbstractEntityView
        • view.animations.unit.AbstractEnemyView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnimationView, EntityAnimationView
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BallomView, MinvoView, PassView

    public abstract class AbstractEnemyView
extends AbstractEntityView
    This class handles the graphical aspects related only to enemies. In this implementation there is an indicator of the remaining lives that is very useful in the game.
